articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark Founding Anniversary of KPA
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark Founding Anniversary of KPA
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place in front of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on Friday to mark the 83rd founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Yong Gil and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party and armed forces organs, Cabinet, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments, heroes, those who had the honor of being received by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, discharged soldiers, servicemen's families, persons who performed merits in aiding the army, working people in Pyongyang, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and military attaches in foreign embassies here.
					
					 Army General Ri Yong Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the KPA General Staff, made a report.
					
					 The KPA has invariably remained true to the monolithic idea, leadership and tradition, holding the peerless Songun brilliant commanders in high esteem for over 80 years from the early period of the revolution, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung taught the immutable truth of Songun in the grimmest period of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, the first revolutionary armed forces of Juche type, on April 25, Juche 21 (1932).
					
					 He led the anti-Japanese armed ranks to defeat the Japanese imperialists. After the liberation of Korea he successfully accomplished the cause of building the regular armed forces under the complicated situation where the people were building a new society. He led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory, inflicting a disgraceful defeat upon the U.S. imperialist aggressors who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and defending the freedom and independence of the country.
					
					 In the whole period of leading the postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist revolution and construction he consistently applied the principle of attaching importance to arms and giving priority to military affairs and the military line of self-defence, training the KPA as a-match-for-a-hundred revolutionary army, building a modern defence industry and turning the DPRK into a country self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Embarking on the road of the Songun revolutionary leadership in his early years, leader Kim Jong Il considered it as the general task of army building to model the whole army on Kimilsungism, energetically led the struggle to carry it out and developed the KPA into the army of the leader and the party.
					
					 He pursued the Songun politics in all fields during the grim ordeals of the Korean revolution, projected the KPA as the pillar and main force for the Songun revolution, put the DPRK on the position of world-class military power and nuclear weapons state and won victory after victory in the struggle to defend socialism.
					
					 The KPA is greeting a new heyday of its development as it is holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem as its supreme commander.
					
					 He put forward the great programme for army building in the new century of Juche to model the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and made sure that the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on army building are thoroughly carried out and all military affairs and activities are conducted the way they did.
					
					 The KPA is the army of the supreme commander, matchless army and the standard-bearer and shock brigade implementing the party's idea and defending the party's policies in the van.
					
					 The reporter called upon the service personnel and people to step up the building of a thriving socialist nation and bring earlier national reunification and a final victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche by dint of Songun under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Calls for Boosting Friendly and Cooperative Relations with Asian, African Countries
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Calls for Boosting Friendly and Cooperative Relations with Asian, African Countries
Jakarta, April 22 (KCNA correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, who is heading the DPRK government delegation, on April 22 made a speech at the Afro-Asian Summit being held in Indonesia.
					 The Afro-Asian Conference, which was held in Indonesia for the first time 60 years ago, was a historic assembly of weighty significance in helping the peoples of the two continents, who had been pushed out of history in the past, hew out their destiny as the masters of the world, Kim said, noting that the spirit of Bandung Conference is encouraging the peoples of the Afro-Asian countries in their efforts to build an independent world.
					
					 He referred to the fact that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il conducted energetic external activities, rendering unreserved support and encouragement to the Afro-Asian countries' national liberation struggle and building of new society.
					
					 The noble feats the President and Kim Jong Il performed for the human cause of independence are being successfully carried forward and developed by Marshal Kim Jong Un, he said, and went on:
					
					 Consistent is the stand of the DPRK government to boost the bonds of friendship and solidarity with the peoples of the Afro-Asian countries, true to the intention of the President, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The invasion, military threat, sanctions, pressure and all forms of interference in internal affairs of other countries by some specified states under various pretexts in the new century, unfair international economic order and the negative effect of "globalization" require the Afro-Asian countries to boost comprehensive cooperation and bonds in the fields of politics, economy and social culture to achieve peace and prosperity by their concerted efforts.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam pointed to the issues to which the summit should pay attention.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula remains so tense that a war may break out anytime due to the U.S. anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and the former's reckless confrontation hysteria, he said, and continued:
					
					 It is nonsensical and hypocritical for the U.S. to talk about dismantlement of nukes and "human rights" as it has the biggest stockpile of nuclear weapons in the world and is the only country which inflicted a nuclear disaster upon mankind and is recognized as the worst tundra of human rights.
					
					 The U.S. is seeking an ulterior aim to deter the DPRK from making peaceful development and stifle it through threat of military aggression and political and economic pressure on it and, furthermore, lay a springboard for carrying out its strategy for world domination.
					
					 The DPRK's efforts to build an economic power and improve the standard of the people's living urgently require a peaceful environment.
					
					 Peace dear to us can never be achieved for only desiring and begging for it.
					
					 A war is averted and peace be preserved on the Korean peninsula where interests of big powers are intertwined and the U.S. is resorting to frantic war moves against the DPRK. This is entirely ascribable to the powerful war deterrence including nuclear force the DPRK bolstered up in every way by dint of the Songun politics.
					
					 A great heyday of creation and construction is being ushered in and a great turn effected in the building of a thriving socialist nation and highly civilized nation in the DPRK thanks to the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Such efforts of the DPRK will contribute to defending peace and security not only on the Korean peninsula but in the region and other parts of the world and boosting south-south cooperation to inject a new life into the new Afro-Asian strategic partnership.
					
					 We are making all sincere efforts to bring about a great turn in the north-south relations this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation but a stumbling block is still lying in the way of mending the inter-Korean relations and reunifying the country owing to the anti-reunification attitude of the south Korean authorities keen on confrontation with the compatriots in the north through cooperation with foreign forces.
					
					 The situation remains complicated and we are facing difficulties but we will pave a broad avenue to independent reunification through the great national unity and build a dignified, prosperous reunified powerful nation on this land without fail.
					
					 The DPRK government will make all efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the Afro-Asian countries and build an independent, peaceful and prosperous new world, Kim concluded.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets State and Government Heads of Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets State and Government Heads of Various Countries
Jakarta, April 22 (KCNA correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, separately met and had talks with the president of Madagascar, the prime minister of Rwanda and the vice-president of Venezuela in Jakarta on Apr. 22. Kim is attending the Afro-Asian summit.
					 Heri Rajaonarimampianina, president of Madagascar, expressed his will to strive for boosting in various fields the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Madagascar provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Anastase Murekezi, prime minister of Rwanda, said his country achieved political independence amid sincere support and encouragement by the DPRK, adding that he would continue developing friendship and cooperation with it.
					
					 Jorge Arreaza Montserrat, vice-president of Venezuela, sincerely thanked the Korean people for extending invariable support and solidarity to the Bolivarian Revolution of Venezuela. He clarified the stand to make efforts to develop the friendly ties with the DPRK in all fields and strengthen the non-aligned movement.
					
					 Earlier, Kim separately met and had talks with Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle and former president of Indonesia, and Basuki Tjahaja Purnama, mayor of Jakarta City, and his party.

articles.title: Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Mansour Chavoshi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor who is chairman of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Association, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador said that thanks to the President the Korean people could achieve progress and prosperity while foiling threat and blackmail of the hostile forces and their moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would translate the noble desires of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il into reality thanks to the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said that the Iranian people would always support and encourage the Korean people in their struggle to oppose outsiders' interference and defend the sovereignty of the country and the gains of revolution.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said that the President was a great master in ideology and theory who founded the immortal Juche idea steering the era of independence, peerless patriot and founding-father of socialist Korea, he noted.
					
					 The reunified thriving socialist nation will certainly be built as desired by the President and Kim Jong Il as Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean revolution, he said.
					
					 The Korean people will always extend invariable support and solidarity to the Iranian people in their just struggle to achieve the development and prosperity of the country, he concluded.

articles.title: Russian Government Economic Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Government Economic Delegation Here
Pyongyang April 24 (KCNA) -- A government economic delegation of the Russian Federation headed by Alexandr Galushka, minister of Development of Far East who is chairman of the Russian side to the  DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Committee for the Cooperation in Trade, Economy, Science and Technology, arrived here on Friday to participate in its seventh meeting.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Assails S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Demonstrators
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Assails S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Demonstrators
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) on Friday made public information bulletin No. 1091 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' suppression of demonstrators honoring the memory of the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The information bulletin termed the ongoing anti-"government" actions staged in south Korea one year since the ferry Sewol disaster with broad sections of people involved entirely just ones as they were an eruption of the south Koreans' pent-up grudge and anger at the puppet conservative group. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The puppet group, however, cracked down on the bereaved families and demonstrators ruthlessly, far from lending an ear to their voices. This was a thrice-cursed crime against humanity and hideous human rights abuse that revealed its despicable nature. 
					
					 It was unprecedented in the world that the puppet group hurled riot police into the operations to ruthlessly suppress the bereaved families grieving over the death of their children claimed by the horrible disaster for which it is responsible and the guiltless inhabitants sympathetic with them after labeling them "undesirable forces" and "political agitators." At a time when bereaved families of victims of the ferry Sewol disaster and demonstrators were dragged to police stations, shedding blood due to tear liquid sprayed by fascist police and the whole of south Korea turned into a mourner's house shaking with angry cries, the present chief executive started her overseas trip, paying no heed to them, and enjoyed herself wining and dining in her gorgeous dress. This despicable behavior stunned the world.
					
					 However, the puppet group is hell-bent on the suppression, threatening to ferret out the masterminds and core members involved in the "violent rallies" to the last one and take legal actions against all of them, far from making an apology and reflection on the crackdown. 
					
					 All these facts go to prove that the puppet group is hordes of cruel human butchers and human rights abusers.

articles.title: AFC Coaching Course in DPRK
articles.content:
AFC Coaching Course in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The AFC (Asian Football Confederation) "A" license award coaching course (second phase) took place here on April 10-24 in the wake of coaching course (first phase) in October last year. 
					 The course dealt with coaches' making of training plan, players' attaining of physical condition before match, attack and defence tactics of team, etc.
					
					 There were also tests for estimating theoretical and practical standard of coaches and instructors who participated in the course and a lecture on the anti-dope rules of the 2015 AFC. 
					
					 Closing the course, Ardeshir Pournemat Nodehi, an AFC coach instructor, said that most of the participants in the course have rich experience and that good coaches would be produced among them.

articles.title: Feats of Great Persons of Mt. Paektu for Army Building
articles.content:
Feats of Great Persons of Mt. Paektu for Army Building
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the birthday of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army which developed into the regular Korean People's Army, the DPRK people are recalling the great feats of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, great persons of Mt. Paektu, for army building.
					 The history of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces is that of love and trust and loyalty between the leaders and soldiers.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, Kim Il Sung had shown all sorts of love for the guerrillas. He offered his overcoat for a wounded guerrilla and saw to it that dried venison was kept for guerrillas active in distant areas.
					
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War, he provided a large amount of bean for the soldiers at the front to improve their diet and took a step to run frontline rest homes for the servicepersons. Such his paternal love greatly encouraged the combatants to display heroism in the war against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The KPA had further strengthened into an invincible army under the guidance of Kim Jong Il, who created a world of trust and love for servicepersons.
					
					 He made long journeys through snow-covered road to meet soldiers even on holidays and provided medical cream for coast artillery women.
					
					 Now the KPA fully displays its dignity and might as an invincible army closely rallied around Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, who is steadily making a history of love for the servicepersons, regarding them as his true comrades-in-arms.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 10 Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 10 Off Press
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 10, an encyclopedia of the Juche idea and the Songun idea which comprehensively deals with leader Kim Jong Il's works in a chronological order, was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House.
					 The book contains 91 works he published between June, Juche 56 (1967) and April, Juche 57 (1968).
					
					 The works reflect the ideas and wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who made sure that education in the party's monolithic ideology was dynamically pushed forward on a new high stage.
					
					 "On Stamping Out the Ideologically Evil Consequences of the Anti-Party, Counter-Revolutionary Elements and Establishing the Party's Monolithic Ideological System", "The People's Army Should Uphold the Leader's Idea of Building the Revolutionary Armed Forces" and other works clarify the basic aim of the struggle to establish the party's monolithic ideological system and the principled issues which should be maintained in developing it onto a new higher stage.
					
					 Contained in the book are works which indicate the tasks for bringing about innovations in the party's ideological work and making the media of the DPRK the revolutionary media remaining loyal to the guidance of the party and the leader.
					
					 The book also contains works which deal with the validity of the revolutionary line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and defence up-building and indicate the tasks and ways for bolstering up the defence capabilities including the issue of helping all service personnel and people make political and ideological preparations and carrying out the military line of self-reliance.
					
					 There are in the book the works clarifying the issue of developing agriculture, fishery and stock breeding, the issue of improving the standard of people's living in the mountainous areas, the issue of compiling the teaching programs at universities properly and rounding off their material and technological foundation and the issue of having a correct understanding of the political, moral and material incentives.

articles.title: Pine Tree Symbolic of Spirit of DPRK
articles.content:
Pine Tree Symbolic of Spirit of DPRK
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A dynamic campaign is now going on in the DPRK to plant various species of trees, including pine trees.
					 Pine tree ranges more widely than other species in Korea and has been regarded as the national tree.
					
					 In this regard, KCNA met Jo Tae Il, chairman of the Folklore Society of the DPRK.
					
					 Jo said:
					
					 Pine represents the soul and spirit of the Korean nation.
					
					 From olden times, Koreans have considered pine forest as the top among natural sceneries. It is well evidenced by mural paintings of pine trees found in Ryongsan-ri tombs, which date back to the Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 688), and famous old Korean paintings.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik, President Kim Il Sung's father who was an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement, set forth an idea of "Aim High" and composed a poem "Green Pine on Nam Hill" in reflection of his firm pledge to bring about national independence at any cost.
					
					 True to Kim Hyong Jik's lofty aim, Kim Il Sung set on the revolutionary road in his early years to fight against the Japanese aggressors, finally liberating Korea from Japan's colonial rule.

articles.title: U.S. Trite Method Is Unworkable on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Trite Method Is Unworkable on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Brass hats of the U.S. military are vying with each other to bluster as if something serious had happened, asserting that the DPRK succeeded in producing smaller nukes and reached the level of tipping ICBMs developed by itself with those nukes.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard: 
					
					 The nuclear weapons of the DPRK are aimed to defend itself, prevent a war on the Korean peninsula and ensure peace and security in Northeast Asia from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. is resorting to a trite method of meeting its interests by pulling up others.
					
					 It seeks to realize its ambition for dominating Northeast Asia and other parts of the Asia-Pacific region by taking issue with "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK. There are in the region those countries capable of challenging the U.S. Recently these countries are making faster progress than expected and more closely cooperating with each other. This is irritating the U.S. seeking its hegemonic position in the region. 
					
					 The reality requires the DPRK to further bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence for ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of Northeast Asia and, furthermore, in the rest of the world. This is an exercise of an inviolable sovereign right of the DPRK as it is entirely just and designed to protect the destiny of the nation and the supreme interests of the country.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will never allow anyone to encroach upon its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. had better ponder over this.

articles.title: S. Koreans Demand Resignation of Puppet Prime Minister
articles.content:
S. Koreans Demand Resignation of Puppet Prime Minister
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- South Koreans are demanding Ri Wan Gu, puppet prime minister, step down as he committed heinous scandal.
					 Government employees affiliated to the Government Employees Union published a declaration on the situation on April 20 at which they said that in order to set right the wrong society it is necessary for the "prime minister" to step down, to begin with.
					
					 The prosecution's investigation can never be conducted properly as long as Ri Wan Gu stays in office, the declaration said.
					
					 The present chief executive should make an apology to the people for her self-righteous appointment of Ri as "prime minister" though lot of scandals related to him were disclosed, it noted.
					
					 Members of the Sejong Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society launched one-by-one demonstration on April 20 in demand of the immediate resignation of Ri.
					
					On April 19, the Social Tendency Institute conducted an opinion poll among 1,000 men and women across south Korea. An overwhelming majority of the respondents demanded the resignation of Ri.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Accuses Park Geun Hye of Blaming Others for Failure in Personal Affairs
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Accuses Park Geun Hye of Blaming Others for Failure in Personal Affairs
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on April 21 accused Park Geun Hye of shifting the blame for the failure in personal affairs onto others.
					 As regards "prime minister" Ri Wan Gu's tendering of his resignation, Park on a foreign tour said it was to be regretted and she felt "prime minister's pain", the paper recalled.
					
					 She expressed neither apology nor regret for the confused political situation caused by the "prime minister" appointed by her, blaming others, it said.

articles.title: Koreans in Canada Stage Actions to Demand Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
Koreans in Canada Stage Actions to Demand Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- An action demanding the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster was staged in Canada on April 18 on the lapse of one year since the disaster. It was sponsored by the People in Toronto Remembering Ferry Sewol, an organization of Koreans in Canada.
					 The organization has been on a hunger strike for more than 240 days since it proposed a relay hunger strike of overseas Koreans in solidarity with the hunger strike of the bereaved families of the disaster. 
					
					 That day Koreans in Canada honored the memory of the victims.
					
					 Several Koreans had their hair cut short in solidarity with bereaved families who had their hair cut short.
					
					 They said that they were all greatly enraged to hear the news of the south Korean authorities' suppression of bereaved families and other people in Kwanghwamun and Youido, Seoul.
					
					 They staged a demonstration.
					
					 On April 16 and 17 religionists and other Koreans staged actions in demand of the probe into the truth about the disaster.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups illustrated with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Indonesian paper International Daily on April 7 devoted one whole page to articles under the headline of "Congratulations on the Day of the Sun of the DPRK".
					
					 The paper noted that the President is immortal for his personality as the great man, referring to the noble sense of internationalist obligation of the outstanding revolutionary and man of lofty character.
					
					 The paper carried an article on the feats the President performed for the country's reunification.
					
					 The Lao paper Pasason on April 6 and the April 6-12 issue of Heng Ngan edited articles praising the great feats and noble traits of the President together with what personages of different countries said.
					
					 The Ethiopian paper Reporter on April 4 noted that when we remember the President, his smiling image flashes into our minds, to begin with.
					
					 His smiling image is an expression of the most sincere love for the people and warm humanity and fragrance of the great man peculiar to the President, it noted.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on April 15 noted that the President was not only the leader of a country but also the tender-hearted father of the people.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Pakistan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Pakistan
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Seminars, meetings, book exhibitions and film shows took place in Karachi and Lahore of Pakistan on April 14 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were works of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Masikryong Ski Resort".
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The secretary general of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies said that the progressives of the world are highly praising the President as a legendary hero who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation and saved the destiny of the Korean people and an outstanding statesman recognized by the world.
					
					 The rector of Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto College of Law lauded the President as the peerlessly great man who recorded the shining chapters of the revolutionary victory in the annals of the 20th century.
					
					 The chairman of the Lahore Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that the President defeated the Japanese imperialists, liberated the country and turned the DPRK into the socialist power of Juche.
					
					 A minister of the Sind Provincial Government called upon all the participants to study the Juche idea opposing domination and subjugation and making the popular masses realize consciousness of independence and revolution.
					
					 The general secretary of the Sind Provincial Committee of the Awami National Party said that the President is immortal in the hearts of the progressives of the world.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated by DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated by DPRK Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Receptions, round-table talks, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place at the DPRK missions in Russia, Vietnam, Laos, Mongolia, Cambodia, Iran, Myanmar, India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Indonesia, Malaysia, Nepal, Singapore and Uzbekistan, the DPRK permanent mission to the UN and the DPRK permanent mission to the UN Secretariat and international organizations in Geneva between April 6 and 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were their works and books and photos showing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Eternal Treasures in Praise of Sun" and "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the President.
					
					 A vice-prime minister of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration of Russia said that the President was the great leader and outstanding statesman who brought freedom, liberation and prosperity to the Korean people.
					
					 A vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Myanmar lauded that the exploits the President performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence are shedding their rays as a beacon indicating the way to be followed by progressive mankind.
					
					 The chairperson of the Youth Movement of Pakistan said that the President was the most distinguished state leader recognized by the world and the genius of creation who liberated Korea and built the people's paradise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mexico
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was published in booklet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on April 13. 
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetimes.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly upholding and preserving their ideas and exploits and eternally glorifying them.

articles.title: Angolan Personages Blast Japan's Crackdown on Chongryon
articles.content:
Angolan Personages Blast Japan's Crackdown on Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Angolan personages released statements on April 11 and 13 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 A vice-director of the international department of the Women's Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola said:
					
					 We express great concern about the Japanese reactionaries' unreasonable crackdown on Chongryon, the dignified organization of overseas Koreans of the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' recent search of the houses of senior officials of Chongryon is stirring up strong protest and denunciation of the world justice-loving progressive people as it is an unprecedented crime.
					
					 We always express support and solidarity with Chongryon and Koreans in Japan in their just efforts to defend the national right and dignity.
					
					 The director of the social education department of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples said that the human rights abuses against senior officials of Chongryon committed by the Japanese reactionaries without any legal ground are a product of their base plots to fan up hostility towards the DPRK and Chongryon and deteriorate the DPRK-Japan relations deliberately and justify the lurch to the Right and fascistization.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por 83o aniversario de fundacion de EPC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por 83o aniversario de fundacion de EPC
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en la explanada frente al Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria el acto central por el 83o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Asistieron Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Yong Gil y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de los organismos, fabricas y empresas de esta capital, los heroes, las personas recibidas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los militares licenciados, los familiares de militares, los ameritados en la ayuda al ejercito, los trabajadores y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					El dijo que durante mas de 80 anos desde el inicio de la revolucion coreana, el Ejercito Popular de Corea ha venido apoyando la unica idea, unica direccion y unico linaje bajo la guia de los generales del Songun. 
					
					En el periodo mas oscuro de la dominacion colonial por el imperialismo japones, el Presidente Kim Il Sung aclaro la filosofia de Songun y fundo el 25 de abril del 21 (1932) de la Era Juche el Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea, primeras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de tipo jucheano, destaco y continuo:
					
					Aniquilo al imperialismo japones conduciendo la guerrilla antijaponesa y despues de la liberacion del pais, cumplio con brillantez la causa de construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares aun en medio de la situacion complicada de la construccion de nueva sociedad. 
					
					Y al conducir a la victoria la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, dio la derrota vergonzosa a los imperialistas norteamericanos que se jactaban de la "supremacia" mundial y defendio honrosamente la libertad y la independencia de la patria. 
					
					Durante todo el periodo de su direccion sobre la reconstruccion posbelica y la revolucion y la construccion socialistas, el Presidente mantuvo siempre el principio de dar importancia a las fuerzas armadas y a los asuntos militares y la linea militar de autodefensa. De esta manera, formo el EPC como ejercito revolucionario capaz de pelear uno contra cien enemigos, levanto la moderna industria de defensa nacional y convirtio la RPDC en el pais autodefensivo. 
					
					Al emprender el camino de la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el kimilsungismo como tarea final de la construccion militar y fortalecio el EPC como ejercito del lider y del partido.
					
					En el periodo severo de la revolucion coreana, practico la politica de Songun presentando el EPC como pilar y grueso de la revolucion del Songun. Convirtio la RPDC en la potencia militar de talla mundial y pais poseedor de armas nucleares y logro victoria tras victoria en la defensa del socialismo. 
					
					Hoy dia, el EPC acoge la era dorada de su desarrollo gracias a tener al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo. 
					
					El Mariscal presento la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo como programa de construccion militar de la nueva centuria del Juche y lo dirigio sabiamente para materializar los legados de los Generalisimos en materia de la construccion militar y realizar todas las laboras y actividades militares a la manera del Presidente y del Dirigente. 
					
					El EPC es el ejercito poderoso del Comandante Supremo y el primer abanderado y brigada en materializar y defender la idea y las politicas del partido.
					
					Todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes coreanos deben acelerar con el poderio del Songun la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y adelantar la victoria final de la reunificacion de la patria y de la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo la orientacion del Mariscal.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con jefes de Estado y gobierno de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con jefes de Estado y gobierno de varios paises
Yakarta, 22 de abril (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien participa en la Cumbre Asia-Africa, se reunio el dia 22 en Yakarta con el presidente de la Republica de Madagascar, el premier de la Republica de Ruanda y el vicepresidente de la Republica Bolivariana de Venezuela, respectivamente.
					En la ocasion el presidente de Madagascar, Heri Rajaonarimampianina, dijo que hara todos esfuerzos por ampliar y desarrollar en varias ramas las relaciones de amistad y colaboracion entre Madagascar y Corea con largas tradiciones preparadas por los lideres antecedentes.
					
					El premier de Ruanda, Anastase Murekezi, se refirio a que su pais logro la independencia politica bajo el apoyo y solidaridad sinceros de la RPDC y expreso la decision de seguir desarrollando la amistad y cooperacion con ella.
					
					El vicepresidente venezolano, Jorge Arreasa Monserat, subrayo que da agradecimiento de corazon al pueblo coreano que ofrece el invariable apoyo y solidaridad a la revolucion bolivariana de Venezuela y anadio que se esforzara por desarrollar en varias ramas las relaciones de amistad con la RPDC y fortalecer el Movimiento de los No Alineados.
					
					Por otra parte, Kim departio el dia 21 con Megawati Soekarnoputri, presidenta general del Consejo de Direccion Central del Partido Democratico de Lucha de Indonesia y ex presidenta de la Republica de Indonesia y el gobernador de Yakarta, Basuki Tjahaja Purnama y su comitiva, respectivamente.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expone decision de desarrollar relaciones con paises asiaticos y africanos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expone decision de desarrollar relaciones con paises asiaticos y africanos
Yakarta, 22 de abril (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien preside a la delegacion de la RPDC pronuncio el dia 22 un discurso en la Cumbre Afro-Asiatica que se efectua en Indonesia. 
					Kim dijo que la reunion afro-asiatica, realizada por primera vez en Indonesia hace ahora 60 anos, fue una cita historica y de gran importancia que permitio a los pueblos de dos continentes marginados de la historia forjar por su propia cuenta el destino de si mismos como duenos del mundo, y agrego que el espiritu de Bandung estimula el avance de los pueblos de los paises asiaticos y africanos por construir el mundo independiente. 
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il brindaron con sus energicas actividades exteriores el sincero apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha de libracion nacional y la construccion de nueva sociedad en los paises afro-asiaticos,  dijo el orador y continuo:
					
					Las nobles proezas de los grandes lideres por la causa de la independencia de la humanidad continuan con brillantez por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Es invariable la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de fortalecer los lazos de amistad y solidaridad con los paises afro-asiaticos en acato al proposito de los grandes lideres antecedentes y del Mariscal.
					
					La invasion armada, la amenaza militar, la sancion, la presion y la intervencion de toda indole en los asuntos internos de otros paises, que se cometen en el nuevo siglo por algunos paises especificos bajo los diferentes pretextos injustos, el imparcial orden economico internacional y la influencia negativa de la "globalizacion" demandan a los paises afro-asiaticos consolidar la cooperacion comprensiva y los lazos en los dominios politico, economico y sociocultural y asegurar con los esfuerzos conjuntos la paz y la prosperidad. 
					
					Debido a la anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC y la imprudencia conflictiva de EE.UU., en la Peninsula Coreana perdura la peor situacion en que pueda estallar la guerra en cualquier momento. 
					
					Es ilogico e hipocrita que EE.UU., reconocido como pais poseedor de mayor cantidad de armas nucleares, unico acarreador de desastres nucleares y peor infierno de derechos humanos en el mundo, hable de la renuncia nuclear y de los "derechos humanos". 
					
					EE.UU. persigue el malsano intento de frenar el desarrollo pacifico de la RPDC y aplastarla mediante la amenaza militar y la presion politica y economica y preparar el trampolin favorable a su estrategia de hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Nuestros esfuerzos por la construccion de una potencia economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo necesitan imprescindiblemente el ambiente pacifico. 
					
					Pero, la paz tan preciosa para nosotros no se logra por el deseo ni por la mendicacion. 
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana donde estan enredados los intereses de las potencias y se libran los fanaticos ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC de EE.UU. se previene la guerra y se defiende la paz, gracias a las armas nucleares y el fuerte disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC consolidado con la politica de Songun. 
					
					Por la destacada y probada orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, en la RPDC se abre una era dorada de creacion y construccion y se registra un gran cambio en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y pais civilizado. 
					
					Tales esfuerzos contribuiran a preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, la region y el resto del mundo, ampliar y desarrollar la cooperacion Sur-Sur y activar las relaciones de acompanantes estrategicos afro-asiaticos. 
					
					Hacemos sinceros esfuerzos por traer un gran viraje en las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas este ano del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, pero se ponen graves obstaculos en el avance por la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion de la patria debido a la actitud anti-reunificacion de las autoridades surcoreanas que recurren a la confrontacion fratricida en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Pero, abriremos el ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con la gran unidad nacional y levantaremos sin falta sobre el territorio patrio la potencia reunificada digna y prospera. 
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC hara todo lo posible por ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises asiaticos y africanos y construir un nuevo mundo independiente, pacifico y prospero.

articles.title: CRPP condena maniobras represivas de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP condena maniobras represivas de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 24 la informacion no.1091 condenando las maniobras represivas de las autoridades surcoreanas contra los participantes en la manifestacion de recordacion de la tragedia del ferry "Sewol".
					El documento aclara que la lucha anti-"gobierno" de los habitantes surcoreanos de varios estratos, desplegada con motivo de un ano del accidente de hundimiento del citado ferry  es la justa lucha siendo la explosion de la colera y el rencor arraigado del pueblo surcoreano contra la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					A pesar de ello, las autoridades surcoreanas no prestaron oido a la voz de los familiares de las victimas del accidente y los participantes en la manifestacion sino los reprimieron brutalmente, lo cual puso al desnudo el caracter vil de ellos y la nefanda atrocidad antietica y anti-DDHH, senala la nota y continua:
					
					No hubo en el mundo el antecedente en que la banda surcoreana al tomar como "fuerzas malignas" y "agitadores politicos" a los familiares que perdieron a sus hijos por la tragedia ocurrida por culpa de las autoridades y a los inocentes habitantes que simpatizaron con ellos, les reprimieron salvajemente movilizando a los policias dotados de armas pesadas.
					
					Para colmo, indigno a todo el mundo la conducta grosera de la mandataria surcoreana que realiza una visita a los paises extranjeros dando espalda al hecho de que los familiares de las victimas de la tragedia del ferry "Sewol" y los participantes en la manifestacion vomitaron sangre por el liquido de lacrimogeno lanzado por los policias fascistas y fueron arrastrados como animales.
					
					A pesar de esto, la banda titere no pide disculpas sino se entrega a la represion exponiendo que perseguiran hasta el fin a los autores y los personajes nucleares del "mitin violento" y trataran juridicamente a todos ellos.
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran que la banda titere surcoreana es precisamente la horda de homicidas brutales sin precedentes y caudillos de violacion de DDHH.
					
					Al dejarlos intactos los habitantes surcoreanos nunca podran disfrutar de una vida verdadera del ser humano ni evitar la segunda y tercera tragedia del ferry "Sewol".

articles.title: Coreanos en Canada demandan averiguacion de verdad de tragedia de ferry "Sewol"
articles.content:
Coreanos en Canada demandan averiguacion de verdad de tragedia de ferry "Sewol"
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo de un ano de la tragedia del ferry "Sewol", se efectuo el dia 18 en Canada la lucha por la demanda de la averiguacion de verdad, bajo auspicios de la entidad de coreanos en Canada "Personas de Toronto que recuerdan el ferry Sewol".
					Esta entidad propuso el ayuno de relevo solidario de los compatriotas en ultramar con la lucha de la misma forma de los familiares del barco "Sewol" y lo ha desplegado durante mas de 240 dias.
					
					Este dia, los compatriotas recordaron a las victimas de la tragedia.
					
					Varios compatriotas cortaron al rape en senal de solidaridad con la lucha de los familiares de las victimas de la tragedia.
					
					Ellos expresaron la colera sobre la noticia de represion de las autoridades surcoreanas a los familiares y habitantes en Kwanghwamun y Youido de Seul.
					
					Luego, ellos realizaron la marcha de manifestacion. 
					
					Con anterioridad, los religiosos y otros coreanos en Canada efectuaron los dias 16 y 17 en Toronto la lucha para exigir la averiguacion de la verdad de la tragedia del ferry "Sewol" y la solucion de la situacion.
